meanings.definition: To immunize to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: The doctors are hyperimmunizing the patients to protect them from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: The hospital is hyperimmunizing the community to prevent the spread of diseases.
meanings.sent3: The superhero hyperimmunized the city, making everyone invincible to harm.
meanings.sent4: The scientist's research hyperimmunized the mice, making them resistant to all viruses.
meanings.sent5: Hyperimmunizing the crops with special chemicals made them grow stronger and healthier.

meanings.definition: The act of providing immunity in excess.
meanings.sent1: Hyperimmunizing can help create a shield against harmful germs.
meanings.sent2: The hyperimmunizing of the population was crucial during the outbreak.
meanings.sent3: The hyperimmunizing process seemed like a magical spell to protect everyone.
meanings.sent4: The hyperimmunizing of the soldiers made them almost invincible in battle.
meanings.sent5: The hyperimmunizing of the animals in the zoo kept them safe from diseases.
